name: 古瓊昇
objective:
合成孔徑雷達（Synthetic Aperture Radar, SAR）教學大綱：
本課程會涵蓋合成孔徑雷達的基礎概念包含合成孔徑雷達的工作原理、優點和限制。從雷達原理中徑向速度（Doppler effect）、干涉原理、傅里葉變換（Fourier transform）等。而後講述合成孔徑雷達成像：合成孔徑成像原理、像元大小、分辨率、空間分布等。然後在演示合成孔徑雷達信號處理，包含合成孔徑信號處理流程、頻域和時域信號處理方法、多重投影技術、資料處理技巧等。說明合成孔徑雷達應用：合成孔徑雷達在海洋、陸地、大氣和環境等領域的應用。另外上機實作：使用合成孔徑雷達模擬軟計分析軟體進行演示，實現合成孔徑雷達的成像和信號處理。
I. Introduction to Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR)
Definition and history of SAR
Overview of SAR imaging principle
Advantages and disadvantages of SAR compared to other remote sensing techniques
II. SAR Signal Processing
Radar equation and range resolution
Pulse compression techniques
SAR imaging algorithms (Chirp scaling, Range-Doppler, Spotlight SAR)
III. SAR Interferometry
Definition and principles of SAR interferometry
Differential Interferometric SAR (DInSAR)
Persistent Scatterer Interferometry (PSI)
IV. Polarimetric SAR
Definition and principles of polarimetric SAR
Polarimetric decomposition techniques (H/A/Alpha, Freeman-Durden)
Applications of polarimetric SAR
V. SAR Tomography
Definition and principles of SAR tomography
Tomographic SAR imaging algorithms
Applications of SAR tomography
VI. SAR Imaging Modes
Stripmap SAR
ScanSAR
Spotlight SAR
ScanSAR Tomography
VII. SAR Data Processing
SAR data format and standards
SAR data calibration and correction
SAR data visualization and analysis
VIII. SAR Applications
Earth observation and remote sensing
Geology and geophysics
Agriculture and forestry
Emergency response and disaster management
IX. Conclusion
Recap of key concepts and SAR techniques
Discussion of future trends in SAR research and development
Preparing for a career in SAR and remote sensing.
